events.name: New England Patriots at Pittsburgh Steelers

headlines.description: — The wins used to come so easy and so often for David Andrews early in his career with the New England Patriots, the veteran center barely noticed them.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bailey Zappe throws for 3 TDs, Patriots damage Steelers' playoff hopes with 21-18 win

events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at Atlanta Falcons

headlines.description: — Baker Mayfield knew the Falcons would be devoting plenty of attention to Mike Evans and Chris Godwin.
headlines.shortLinkText: Otton hauls in 11-yard scoring pass with 31 seconds left. Bucs beat Falcons 29-25

headlines.description: — The Chicago Bears could be excused for experiencing a few flashbacks as the final stretch unfolded with another comfortable lead over the Detroit Lions.
headlines.shortLinkText: Justin Fields leads Bears to 28-13 win over NFC North-leading Lions

headlines.description: — In a span of six days, Jake Browning has gone from Joe Burrow's little-known backup to the potential savior of the Bengals' season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Backup QB Jake Browning shines again as Bengals pound Colts 34-14 to stay in playoff mix

headlines.description: — When Joe Flacco arrived three weeks ago, Browns star Myles Garrett had his suspicions about what the 38-year-old quarterback had left.
headlines.shortLinkText: Joe Flacco throws 3 TD passes, Browns pick Trevor Lawrence 3 times in 31-27 win vs Jags

events.name: Carolina Panthers at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — Derek Carr sounded determined not to dwell on any dysfunction evident within the Saints' offense after New Orleans overcame three shaky quarters and did enough to defeat the team with the NFL's worst record.
headlines.shortLinkText: Derek Carr overcomes recent injuries and rough start, leads Saints past Panthers 28-6

events.name: Houston Texans at New York Jets

headlines.description: — Zach Wilson overcame a sluggish start, some big hits and a week of criticism and controversy by responding with the type of impressive performance the New York Jets have long been expecting.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zach Wilson leads Jets to 30-6 win over Texans in return. C.J. Stroud leaves late with a concussion

events.name: Los Angeles Rams at Baltimore Ravens

headlines.description: — Tylan Wallace caught the punt cleanly — no easy feat on this wet day — then slipped to his left, spinning away from one potential tackler and racing past a couple of more while barely staying inbounds along the sideline.
headlines.shortLinkText: Walk-off Wallace: Ravens punt returner goes 76 yards for TD in OT in a 37-31 win over the Rams

events.name: Minnesota Vikings at Las Vegas Raiders

headlines.description: — The brand of football Minnesota and Las Vegas played on Sunday set the NFL back 16 years.
headlines.shortLinkText: Vikings beat Raiders 3-0 in lowest-scoring NFL game in 16 years

headlines.description: — Brock Purdy has an embarrassment of riches surrounding him on San Francisco's high-powered offense. The way he is able get all of them the ball is making the 49ers a nearly unstoppable force.
headlines.shortLinkText: Samuel scores 2 TDs, Purdy throws for career-best 368 yards as 49ers beat Seahawks 28-16

events.name: Buffalo Bills at Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: — Sean McDermott thought for a moment that a difficult week for himself and the Buffalo Bills would end with one last gut punch, an audacious touchdown pass by the Kansas City Chiefs with just over a minute left to steal a win Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Bills get go-ahead field goal late, take advantage of Chiefs penalty to hold on for 20-17 win

events.name: Denver Broncos at Los Angeles Chargers

headlines.description: — Russell Wilson and the Denver Broncos put themselves back in the AFC playoff race Sunday with a 24-7 victory over the Los Angeles Chargers, whose season continues to go further off the rails after quarterback <a...
headlines.shortLinkText: Russell Wilson throws 2 TD passes, Justin Herbert injured as Broncos cruise past Chargers 24-7

headlines.description: — Mike McCarthy was nervous for an NFC East showdown with Philadelphia after the Dallas coach missed two days during the week after an emergency appendectomy.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dak Prescott, Brandon Aubrey help Cowboys pull even with Eagles in NFC East with 33-13 victory

headlines.description: — Will Levis knew he couldn't get too caught up on his mistake. The Tennessee Titans' rookie made a bad pitch to running back Derrick Henry in the fourth quarter against the Miami Dolphins, resulting in a fumble that eventually allowed Miami to take a...
headlines.shortLinkText: Will Levis rallies Titans for 2 late TDs, 28-27 win over Dolphins

events.name: Green Bay Packers at New York Giants

headlines.description: — The New York Giants had the ball late in the game, with a chance to rally for an improbable win.
headlines.shortLinkText: DeVito leads clutch drive to Bullock's winning kick as New York Giants top Green Bay Packers 24-22
